divs: Sighting DetailsThe three red orb shaped craft seperated from the bottom of a stationary large triangle. One of the crafts came within a hundred yards of us. My wife got scared and we went inside. These craft appeared to be curious about the fireworks .they were completely silent. The flew unconventionally and were definately intelligent controlled crafts. These were not planes helicopters or balloons . It was so real and close. Hard to walk away from the sight.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: Triangle craft released three red round crafts.
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Lincoln
There were 2 other sightings in Lincoln on or around July 4th 2010
